attributes.action: Change how the BBC is funded
attributes.additional_details: The BBC is out of control with extortionate Salaries and is using it’s financial power in order to make the news rather than report the news. They are no longer independent and fail to represent the government or the people. I am quite willing to support a news based broadcaster that gives unbiased opinions and does not engage in commercial enterprise.
attributes.background: Take away the BBC franchise that allows it to pay extortionate salaries whilst allowing their employees to pursue their own agenda.
